articles.description:
RT nader dabit | nader.lens
Wrapping up a video tutorial for building a full stack app with @SwayLang + @nextjs + @fuel_network and wanted to share a couple of great resources:
1. Awesome Fuel 
https://github.com/FuelLabs/awesome-fuel
2. Fuel Quickstart
https://fuelbook.fuel.network/master/quickstart/developer-quickstart.html#developer-quickstart
3. Run a local node
https://fuelbook.fuel.network/master/for-developers/running-a-local-node.html https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1652088632579174400 https://t.co/9MSxiXLPz3

articles.description:
Well done to all the build000rs in the @web3afrika hackathon, and special congrats to the winners 👏👏
🫡 https://twitter.com/web3afrika/status/1651980108637298689

Web3 Afrika: 🔥Announcing the winners of the Web3 Afrika Hackathon!
We received many amazing submissions & our judges had difficulty deciding on the top projects.
Without further ado, here are the winners:
1st http://manor-cyan.vercel.app
2nd http://tipx.vercel.app
3rd http://web3afrikan-blog.vercel.app https://twitter.com/BunzzDev/status/1651966335826493441 https://t.co/C36dqY4cTa
